control.name: Automated decisions and profiling
control.desc: You must involve the DPO to make sure that automated decisions are ethical and correct and to make sure that data subjects can object to the profiling activities (foresee a secondary process that can manually bypass the processing).

test.steps:
1. Verify with the Data Protection Practitioner the reasoning for automatically gathering personal data from users for profiling purposes is compliant and justified with their requirements.
  2. Verify user mechanisms are in place to object to these profiling activities.
